meanings.definition: The act of fixing or restoring something to good working condition.
meanings.sent1: The repairs on the car made it run smoothly again.
meanings.sent2: The repairs on the roof stopped the leak during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The repairs on the old clock turned it into a ticking treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was the repairs that healed his broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The repairs on the broken bridge saved the town from isolation.

meanings.definition: The process of making something damaged or broken usable again.
meanings.sent1: The repairs on the toy fixed the broken wheel.
meanings.sent2: The repairs on the phone screen made it look brand new.
meanings.sent3: The repairs on the torn book brought its story back to life.
meanings.sent4: His apology was the repairs that restored their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The repairs on the cracked vase made it whole once more.
